title: mediawiki/job
description: Represents a job in Mediawiki JobQueue.

$schema.description: A URI identifying the JSONSchema for this event. This should match an schema's $id in a schema repository. E.g. /schema/title/1.0.0

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event or entity

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event

dt.description: UTC event datetime, in ISO-8601 format

domain.description: Domain the event or entity pertains to

stream.description: Name of the stream/queue/dataset that this event belongs in

database.description: The name of the wiki database this event belongs to.

page_namespace.description: the namespace of the page that the job was triggered for

page_title.description: the title of the page that the job was triggered for

delay_until.description: don't execute the job until a particular time

sha1.description: unique ID of the job derived from the deduplication info

root_event.description: Unique identifier of the root event that triggered this event creation

dt.description: the timestamp of the root event, in ISO8601 format

signature.description: the unique signature of root event

mediawiki_signature.description: The cryptograthic signature of the event baed on MW SecretKey

params.description: various parameters speific to a particular job
